name: Day1ConvectiveWeatherOutlook(unofficial)
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Day 1 convective outlook issued by the Storm Prediction Center. This skill provides the full text of the SPC Day 1 outlook for those interested in the weather or storm chasing. This flash briefing item will typically be fairly short. Care has been taken to replace state and NWS office abbreviations with their full text, but this is in development still.

This author is not affiliated with the SPC and this skill is not endorsed by NOAA, NWS, or SPC. Day 1 Outlook text used through the public domain.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
